Context: The George Brown College Awards program offers financial support for students. There are specific awards for graduates who are full-time students and have demonstrated dedication to their field of study (George Brown College Alumni Award). Another award, the TD Insurance Meloche Monnex Alumni Award, is available to students in any year of study who have overcome obstacles. Students with questions about individual awards or the application process can contact awards@georgebrown.ca. For those interested in expanding the awards program, they can contact the George Brown College Foundation. There are also awards that may not be specified in the text. For more information, including application deadlines and college news, students can sign up on the website or contact 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559) or ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The information in the website is subject to change without notice.
